reviewText: loved  The Secret Garden one of my all time favorites.  Haven't had the time to watch the other 2 yet
I enjoyed having three heartwarming films all on one video.
Great movie for the little kids and reminders of what we also go through daily also
Great True Stories for Families to watch together

My 6-yr-old granddaughter and I LOVE watching these movies.  Worth every penny and more.  Nothing like sitting on the sofa snuggling with you little granddaughter watching good movies - those she will remember and learn from.
Excellent transaction. product brand new, price was amazing! LOVE ALL 3 MOVIES!

I could go on for a very long time about how these films bring and share so much wonderment and beauty to both children and adults alike. Watch them (my all time favorite is Fairy Tale- a true story) and then share with all whom you care about and bring some life and wonderment into their lives.
Fairy Tale: a true story is a delightful story.  It's 'feel good' entertainment.

WE LOVE IT!....WE WATCH IT OVER AND OVER AGAIN.  GREAT STORY LINE ABOUT TWO SWEET LITTLE GIRLS.
IF ONLY THE REST OF THE WORLD WERE MORE LIKE THEM.  HARRY HOUDINI WAS GREAT, TOO!
I didn't realize I was getting 3 films for the price of one. I bought it for Dreamer, the race horse. I'm sure all three stories are wonderful.
Fantastic!!! Making memories with my kiddos!!!
Thank you!  Enjoyed the movies
Great movies and a great deal. My 8 yr old loved all three of these movies.
Great DVD
This was priced right and I really bought it for Dreamer.  The other 2 movies were a bonus, but really good.  My wife and I really like the feel good movies and these were really priced well.
We bought it for one movie, but enjoyed all three. Well worth the money, and we can watch them over again.
great Movie passed them out to others!!!
My granddaughter loves it!
friend enjoyed movie
